src_original: te/_rigs pa'i dbang du byas na g.yon gyi dang po na thod pa yod pas/ g.yas dang po na gri gug bsnams par rigs gsung bas/_g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams nas yum la 'khyud pa/_gnyis pa glang po che'i lpags pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa/_g.yas kyi gsum pa na mtshhon
